channel.title: PiPy :: Learn With Shantanu
channel.description: SUPERSET PRODUCTION INSTALLATION Set up environment Update Ubuntu/Debian sudo apt update -y & sudo apt upgrade -y Install dependencies sudo apt-get install build-essential libssl-dev libffi-dev python3-dev python3-pip libsasl2-dev libldap2-dev default-libmysqlclient-dev python3.10-venv Create app directory for superset and dependencies sudo mkdir /app sudo chown user /app cd /app Create python environment mkdir superset cd superset python3 -m venv superset_env . superset_env/bin/activate pip install --upgrade setuptools pip Install Required dependencies pip install pillow pip install apache-superset Create superset config file and set environment variable touch superset_config.
